backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented Framer Motion animations, glassmorphism UI styling, interactive micro-interactions, and enhanced hero section with particle effects across all portfolio components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing CSS animations, glassmorphism effects, scroll-linked animations, 3D tilt effects, and custom hooks for parallax and spotlight interactions.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode CSS variables, custom color palette using OKLCH color space, and base styling for background and foreground colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, Google Fonts preconnect, and viewport configuration for the portfolio application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that forces dark mode, renders AnimatedBackground, ScrollProgress, navigation, all portfolio sections, and ScrollToTop button.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component with Intersection Observer for visibility detection, glassmorphism cards displaying product strategy, design systems, and visual storytelling key points, plus bio section with profile image.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedBackgrou: Canvas-based animated grid background with moving vertical and horizontal lines and gradient mesh overlay using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with glassmorphism cards showing email, location, and availability info alongside a contact form with name, email, and message inputs.
frontend/src/components/Experience.tsx: Displays professional experience section with timeline, achievements, and scroll-based animations using IntersectionObserver and scroll progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with copyright, attribution to caffeine.ai, and dynamic year display.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with parallax effects, floating UI elements, particle background, and call-to-action buttons for navigation.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with scroll detection, active section tracking, smooth scrolling, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Renders animated grid background pattern with scrolling animation effect.
frontend/src/components/Projects.tsx: Projects showcase with 3D tilt effects, spotlight hover interactions, and staggered fade-in animations for project cards.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgress.t: Fixed top progress bar that visualizes page scroll progress with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTop.tsx: Floating button that appears on scroll and smoothly returns user to top of page.
frontend/src/components/Skills.tsx: Skills section displaying categorized expertise in bento grid layout with icons and intersection-observer-based animations.
frontend/src/hooks/use3DTilt.ts: Empty file, likely intended for custom 3D tilt effect hook implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages an authenticated or anonymous actor instance using React Query, automatically recreating the actor when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useFramerAnimations.t: Empty file placeholder for Framer Motion animation hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient, managing identity state and delegation validation throughout the React component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useMouseParallax.ts: Empty file placeholder for mouse parallax effect hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Intentionally empty file as the backend has no methods to query; all content is static and rendered client-side.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: Empty file placeholder for scroll progress tracking hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpotlight.ts: Empty file placeholder for spotlight effect hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, Tailwind directives, Plus Jakarta Sans font import, and utility classes for glassmorphism effects and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root React component wrapped with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH colors, sidebar variants, teal/emerald shades, custom border radii, Plus Jakarta Sans font, and animation keyframes for accordions and carousels.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a modern portfolio website for Mukesh Kumar M with Mobbin-style UI, dark theme with teal accents, featuring hero section, timeline experience, project showcases, skills grid, and contact form built with React, Vite, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, and Framer Motion.
